name: Avocado
safe_amount: 0g - mildly toxic, pit is choking/obstruction hazard
description: Avocado contains persin which is mildly toxic to dogs and cats, causing vomiting and diarrhea. Much more dangerous to birds. The pit poses serious choking hazard or can cause intestinal obstruction.

name: Alcohol
description: Alcoholic beverages and foods containing alcohol cause vomiting, coordination loss, CNS depression, breathing difficulties, and can lead to coma and death. Never give alcohol to pets.

name: Raw Yeast Dough
description: Raw dough rises in warm stomach causing dangerous bloating and potential life-threatening gastric dilation-volvulus (GDV). Yeast fermentation also produces alcohol causing additional toxicity.

name: Coffee and Caffeine
description: Caffeine in coffee, tea, energy drinks, and pills causes same methylxanthine toxicity as chocolate. Even moderate amounts dangerous. Sources include coffee grounds, tea bags, coffee beans.

name: Salt (Excess Sodium)
safe_amount: Small amounts okay, but NO salty snacks or foods
description: Excess salt from salty snacks, chips, pretzels, or salt itself causes sodium ion poisoning. Symptoms include excessive thirst/urination, vomiting, tremors, seizures. Especially dangerous for dogs with heart conditions.
